name: The Adventures of Deadly Dawg
description:
Go on an adventure with Deadly Dawg to help save this town from the dangers of Tobacco and learn some facts about smoking along the way!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or screen buttons to move
  • Click on-screen  buttons to chat, navigate the world, and play the minigames
  • ESC to pause

And also, when you complete the game, there's a printable certificate that you can download down below!

Have a deadly tobacco-free adventure everyone! :D

Wayalak Against Tobacco Home Page ↩
